bid.adm:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="ad-12345">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>Demand Partner</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>Sample Video Ad</AdTitle>
      <Impression><![CDATA[https://tracking.example.com/impression?id=12345]]></Impression>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative id="creative-001">
          <Linear>
            <Duration>00:00:30</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/mp4" width="1920" height="1080" bitrate="5000"><![CDATA[https://cdn.example.com/videos/ad-12345.mp4]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
            <TrackingEvents>
              <Tracking event="start"><![CDATA[https://tracking.example.com/start?id=12345]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="firstQuartile"><![CDATA[https://tracking.example.com/25?id=12345]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="midpoint"><![CDATA[https://tracking.example.com/50?id=12345]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="thirdQuartile"><![CDATA[https://tracking.example.com/75?id=12345]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="complete"><![CDATA[https://tracking.example.com/complete?id=12345]]></Tracking>
            </TrackingEvents>
            <VideoClicks>
              <ClickThrough><![CDATA[https://advertiser.example.com/landing]]></ClickThrough>
              <ClickTracking><![CDATA[https://tracking.example.com/click?id=12345]]></ClickTracking>
            </VideoClicks>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="ad-003a">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>Partner A</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>Video Ad A</AdTitle>
      <Impression><![CDATA[https://tracking-a.example.com/imp]]></Impression>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative>
          <Linear>
            <Duration>00:00:15</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/mp4" width="640" height="480"><![CDATA[https://cdn-a.example.com/video.mp4]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="ad-003b">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>Partner B</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>Video Ad B</AdTitle>
      <Impression><![CDATA[https://tracking-b.example.com/imp]]></Impression>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative>
          <Linear>
            <Duration>00:00:15</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/webm" width="640" height="480"><![CDATA[https://cdn-b.example.com/video.webm]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="pod-ad-1" sequence="1">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>Ad Pod System</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>Pre-roll Ad 1</AdTitle>
      <Impression><![CDATA[https://pod-tracking.example.com/imp?seq=1]]></Impression>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative sequence="1">
          <Linear>
            <Duration>00:00:15</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/mp4" width="1920" height="1080"><![CDATA[https://pod-cdn.example.com/ad1.mp4]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="pod-ad-2" sequence="2">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>Ad Pod System</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>Pre-roll Ad 2</AdTitle>
      <Impression><![CDATA[https://pod-tracking.example.com/imp?seq=2]]></Impression>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative sequence="2">
          <Linear>
            <Duration>00:00:30</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/mp4" width="1920" height="1080"><![CDATA[https://pod-cdn.example.com/ad2.mp4]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="pod-ad-3" sequence="3">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>Ad Pod System</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>Pre-roll Ad 3</AdTitle>
      <Impression><![CDATA[https://pod-tracking.example.com/imp?seq=3]]></Impression>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative sequence="3">
          <Linear>
            <Duration>00:00:15</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/mp4" width="1920" height="1080"><![CDATA[https://pod-cdn.example.com/ad3.mp4]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="companion-ad-789">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>Companion System</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>Video with Companions</AdTitle>
      <Impression><![CDATA[https://companion-tracking.example.com/imp]]></Impression>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative>
          <Linear>
            <Duration>00:00:30</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/mp4" width="1920" height="1080"><![CDATA[https://companion-cdn.example.com/video.mp4]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
        <Creative>
          <CompanionAds required="all">
            <Companion id="companion-1" width="300" height="250">
              <StaticResource creativeType="image/jpeg"><![CDATA[https://companion-cdn.example.com/banner-300x250.jpg]]></StaticResource>
              <CompanionClickThrough><![CDATA[https://advertiser.example.com/landing]]></CompanionClickThrough>
            </Companion>
            <Companion id="companion-2" width="728" height="90">
              <StaticResource creativeType="image/png"><![CDATA[https://companion-cdn.example.com/banner-728x90.png]]></StaticResource>
              <CompanionClickThrough><![CDATA[https://advertiser.example.com/landing]]></CompanionClickThrough>
            </Companion>
          </CompanionAds>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="skip-ad-123">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>Skippable Ads</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>Skippable Video</AdTitle>
      <Impression><![CDATA[https://skip-tracking.example.com/imp]]></Impression>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative>
          <Linear skipoffset="00:00:05">
            <Duration>00:00:30</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/mp4" width="1920" height="1080"><![CDATA[https://skip-cdn.example.com/video.mp4]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
            <TrackingEvents>
              <Tracking event="skip"><![CDATA[https://skip-tracking.example.com/skip]]></Tracking>
            </TrackingEvents>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="vpaid-ad-456">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>VPAID System</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>Interactive VPAID Ad</AdTitle>
      <Impression><![CDATA[https://vpaid-tracking.example.com/imp]]></Impression>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative apiFramework="VPAID">
          <Linear>
            <Duration>00:00:30</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="application/javascript" apiFramework="VPAID" width="1920" height="1080"><![CDATA[https://vpaid-cdn.example.com/vpaid-creative.js]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
            <AdParameters xmlEncoded="false"><![CDATA[{"version":"2.0","clickthrough":"https://advertiser.example.com/landing"}]]></AdParameters>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="ctv-4k-ad-789">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>CTV Premium</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>4K Premium Ad</AdTitle>
      <Impression><![CDATA[https://ctv-tracking.example.com/imp]]></Impression>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative>
          <Linear>
            <Duration>00:00:30</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/mp4" width="3840" height="2160" bitrate="15000" codec="h265"><![CDATA[https://ctv-cdn.example.com/video-4k.mp4]]></MediaFile>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/mp4" width="1920" height="1080" bitrate="5000" codec="h264"><![CDATA[https://ctv-cdn.example.com/video-1080p.mp4]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
            <TrackingEvents>
              <Tracking event="start"><![CDATA[https://ctv-tracking.example.com/start]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="complete"><![CDATA[https://ctv-tracking.example.com/complete]]></Tracking>
            </TrackingEvents>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<VAST version="4.0">
  <Ad id="tracking-ad-456">
    <InLine>
      <AdSystem>Full Tracking</AdSystem>
      <AdTitle>Comprehensive Tracking Ad</AdTitle>
      <Impression id="imp-1"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/imp/1]]></Impression>
      <Impression id="imp-2"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/imp/2]]></Impression>
      <Error><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/error?code=[ERRORCODE]]]></Error>
      <Creatives>
        <Creative>
          <Linear>
            <Duration>00:00:30</Duration>
            <MediaFiles>
              <MediaFile delivery="progressive" type="video/mp4" width="1920" height="1080"><![CDATA[https://cdn.example.com/video.mp4]]></MediaFile>
            </MediaFiles>
            <TrackingEvents>
              <Tracking event="creativeView"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/creativeView]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="start"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/start]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="firstQuartile"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/firstQuartile]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="midpoint"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/midpoint]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="thirdQuartile"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/thirdQuartile]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="complete"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/complete]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="mute"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/mute]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="unmute"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/unmute]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="pause"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/pause]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="resume"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/resume]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="fullscreen"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/fullscreen]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="exitFullscreen"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/exitFullscreen]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="skip"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/skip]]></Tracking>
              <Tracking event="close"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/close]]></Tracking>
            </TrackingEvents>
            <VideoClicks>
              <ClickThrough><![CDATA[https://advertiser.example.com/landing]]></ClickThrough>
              <ClickTracking id="click-1"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/click/1]]></ClickTracking>
              <ClickTracking id="click-2"><![CDATA[https://track.example.com/click/2]]></ClickTracking>
            </VideoClicks>
          </Linear>
        </Creative>
      </Creatives>
    </InLine>
  </Ad>
</VAST>
